plot: A man, convinced that the world is actually flat, falls in love with a two-dimensional woman at the Museum of Modern Art in New York. FLAT LOVE is a unique, funny tale of love and obsession...
title: Flat Love
plot_es: A man, convinced that the world is actually flat, falls in love with a two-dimensional woman at the Museum of Modern Art in New York. FLAT LOVE is a unique, funny tale of love and obsession...
